CustomField.description: Value from this field will be used for naming the documents when uploading them to SharePoint
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Type Simploud__Controlled_Document__c object field API names wrapped with the '$' symbol, separated by any symbols. Example: $Simploud__Document_Type__c$-$Name$_$Id4 You can also use constants, like this: Document-$Id$
Important: file names must be unique! Always include Id or other unique fields
CustomField.label: Document Name Format
